actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend section 103 of the Flood Control Act of August 13, 1968 (Public Law 90-483) to provide for beach erosion control and hurricane protection, Bal Harbour Village, Dade County, Fla..

summary.text: Provides for a project for beach erosion control and hurricane protection for Bal Harbour Village, Dade County, Florida under the Flood Control Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 103 of the Flood Control Act of August 13, 1968 (Public Law 90-483) to provide for beach erosion control and hurricane protection, Bal Harbour Village, Dade County, Fla..
